Package com.redhat.rhn.manager.satellite

Interface Summary
Executor Executor - simple interface to describe a way to execute a generic command with the passed in arguments.
SatelliteConfigurator SatelliteConfigurator - interface to describe the storage of configuration to the local machine.
 

Class Summary
BaseConfigureCommand BaseConfigureCommand - abstract class to contain some logic for configuring a Spacewalk.
CertificateManager SatelliteManager
CobblerSyncCommand  
ConfigureBootstrapCommand ConfigureBootstrapCommand - contains logic for setting up and reconfiguring the bootstrap command on the satellite.
ConfigureCertificateCommand Updates the satellite certificate using the rhn-satellite-activate utility.
ConfigureSatelliteCommand ConfigureSatelliteCommand
RestartCommand RestartCommand - simple Command class to restart a Sat.
SystemCommandExecutor SystemCommandExecutor - implementation of the Executor interface that will take in the list of arguments and call Runtime.exec().
UpgradeCommand Class responsible for executing one-time upgrade logic
